QuestData.Title: A Name from the Past
QuestData.Description: It worked! It worked! My comrades can finally enjoy their well-earned rest...$B$BI'll stay here and finish the job. We Hollowstone miners always finish the job -- we never give up!$B$BThat's why Arugal made an example of us. We wouldn't fall in line, you see? We wouldn't join his wolfcult!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Captain Gryan Stoutmantle at the Westfall Brigade Encampment.
QuestData.RewardText: Curse our luck. We find the one functioning mine this side of the hills and it's full of Scourge.$B$BNo offense, friend. But that survivor you found sounds like he's been a little traumatized due to losing his friends. Arugal's been dead for years... I even saw his grave once.
